name: collabdomain-prod
user_data:
#!/bin/bash

# Update system
apt-get update
apt-get upgrade -y

# Install essential tools
apt-get install -y curl wget git htop unzip

# Install Docker Compose
curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/v2.20.2/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose

# Create deployment directory
mkdir -p /opt/collabdomain
cd /opt/collabdomain

# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/Control-B/CollabDOMain.git .

# Set up environment
cp config/digitalocean.env.example .env

# Create logs directory
mkdir -p logs

# Set permissions
chown -R docker:docker /opt/collabdomain

echo 'Setup complete! Ready for deployment.' > /opt/collabdomain/deployment.log
